description: Immigration and Refugee Law examines the legal and regulatory framework under which persons are permitted to migrate to Australia. It examines the various migration programs (Family, Skilled, Refugee) as well as the ability of the courts to review migration decisions.
restricted: LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB, LLB (Graduate Entry), LLB(Hons) duals and LLB dual programs.
